statements: DELETE FROM lab_tests WHERE patient_id = 100 AND test_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM lab_tests WHERE patient_id = 100 AND test_result = 'Positive'
DELETE FROM diagnostic_procedures WHERE patient_id = '93b3c596-fce7-4bc2-a6cd-11a730e3c9b7' AND procedure_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM diagnostic_procedures WHERE patient_id = 100 AND procedure_id = 5;
DELETE FROM diagnostic_procedures WHERE patient_id = 100 AND procedure_result <> 'negative';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE name = 'John Doe';
